snippet: The proposal for a mix of retail space and housing does not conform to existing zoning laws and will require a new environmental review, public hearings and a journey through the review process.
abstract: Proposal for a mix of retail space and housing on 12.75 acres in Willets Point, Queens, does not conform to existing zoning laws and will require a new environmental review, public hearings and a journey through the review process; zoning issue is latest setback in the project and could cause a delay of at least two more years.
lead_paragraph: The proposal for a mix of retail space and housing does not conform to existing zoning laws and will require a new environmental review, public hearings and a journey through the review process.

headline.seo: Zoning Regulations Slow Willets Point Redevelopment Plans
headline.main: Zoning Slows Mayor’s Plan to Remake Willets Point
headline.print_headline: Zoning Slows Plan to Redevelop Willets Pt.
